summary: POWER STEERING GEAR DEFECT RECALL TO REPLACE THE LOWER PINION BEARING.  DEALER NEEDED TO HAVE VEHICLE FOR UP TO 2 WEEKS IN ORDER TO PERFORM RECALL REPAIRS.  RECALL STATED REPAIRS WOULD TAKE FROM 30 MINUTES TO 2-1/2 HOURS.  CONSUMER FOUND DEALER'S REPAIR TIME FRAME UNACCEPTABLE.  *TT   *NLM
